p: Your good letter was so welcome. We are delighted you are so well and busy. Maxie has been washing woodwork and cleaning generally and placing flowers about the rooms place making things beautiful. She surely has the gift! I have been lazy for several days! The Wisteria that blooms so early, tell Ollie, is the Chinese blue. We have it, and the ordinary Kind too It which is now leafing out adn will bloom in a week or so. Yours is the Chinese blue, will not bloom till well established!
